## clipboard.paste() function

Paste a pasteable element into the workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function paste<T extends ICopyData>(copyData: T, workspace: WorkspaceSvg, coordinate?: Coordinate): ICopyable<T> | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  copyData | T | The data to paste into the workspace. |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) | The workspace to paste the data into. |
|  coordinate | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | _(Optional)_ The location to paste the thing at. |

**Returns:**

[ICopyable](./blockly.icopyable_interface.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; \| null

The pasted thing if the paste was successful, null otherwise.
